title: KAS officer set to seek VRS to become monk

title: Life in a treacherous terrain affected by Maoism in Karnataka
description: The recent ‘encounter’ of Maoist leader Vikram Gowda has put the spotlight not only on the movement which has been on a steady decline in Karnataka, but also on the harsh conditions being faced by tribal people in the Western Ghats region from where leaders like him hail. Raghava M. and Sathish G.T. report from the ground
